DOC.brief_summary: Laparoscopic operative procedure revolutionize gynecological surgery . These several advantage : small cosmetic incision , reduce blood loss shorter postoperative stay , cut hospital cost . However , postoperative pain continue one complication , result unpleasant experience patient time cause delayed discharge . There study pain characteristic one laparoscopic hysterectomy complication . The purpose study investigate prevalence characteristic shoulder pain , headache , abdominal pain , back pain patient undergoing total laparoscopic hysterectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Characteristics After Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: ASA I II age > =20 , < = 80 year female patient undergo elective total laparoscopic hysterectomy age < 19 year > 80 year abnormal mental status drug abuse chronic alcoholism immunosuppressant steroid user
